name: Roguelike CCG Prototype
description:
A roguelike and ccg hybrid game prototype. Project currently on hold, may come back in the future to flesh it out.

Game Basics:
-Destroy the enemy crystals to win.
-Max hand size: 5
-Draw 2 cards per turn.
-Sacrifice up to 2 cards per turn to gain mana to cast cards.
-Cards: Top-left (blue number) is mana cost. Bottom-left number is attack power. Bottom-right number is health points.
